body.data:
Patients movement was tested, left shoulder has restricted movement, restriction caused by pain, due to tares in her ligaments.
The patients competitive activities are an excessive stress. 10 days rest and Ponstan 500mg was prescribed as well as 8 weekly sessions at the physiotherapist.

body.data:
Patient is a competitive swimmer, she has joint pain in her left shoulder when she stretches her arms up vertically. 
Her ligaments in the shoulder have small tares from over usage due to her competitive activities.
